definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: The aesthetic views of westerners and people of Song Dynasty were similar to a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 西方人與宋人的審美觀也有一定相近之處。

sentences.english: One of the fission of aesthetic ideas is the dailizati on of aesthetic .
sentences.chinese: 審美觀念的裂變之一，就是審美日常化。

sentences.english: His aesthetic ideas were his own.
sentences.chinese: 他有他自己的審美觀念。

sentences.english: The second chapter illustrates the collusive relations between aesthetic views and economy.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，論證這種審美觀念與經濟的共謀關係。

sentences.english: The third chapter elaborates the idea of female aesthetics.
They have little appreciation for the arts and have poor esthetics.
sentences.chinese: 他們幾乎不欣賞藝術，也缺乏審美觀。

sentences.english: The clients for this project were a young family with a very modern aesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 這次的戶主是一個年輕的家庭，審美觀非常現代。

sentences.english: The reflection of modern aesthetics of Jizhou kiln ceramic decoration.
sentences.chinese: 吉州窯陶飾的現代審美觀照。

sentences.english: My sister's taste in dresses is adverse to my own.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹的服飾審美觀完全與我相反。

sentences.english: In the process of the evolution of the chaos, you obviously ignored the public's aesthetic point of view.
sentences.chinese: 你在混亂的進化過程中，顯然忽略了大衆的審美觀點。

sentences.english: This literary phenomenon was affected by the social morals and esthetic ideas at that time.
sentences.chinese: 這一文學現象與清代社會風氣與清人審美觀念有關。

sentences.english: Emotional teaching promote students form a good character, improve the aesthetic viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 情感教學促進學生養成好的品德，提高審美觀點。

sentences.english: Lan Ting poetic creation of the Eastern Jin Dynasty dated from a new aesthetic idea of mountains and rivers.
sentences.chinese: 東晉蘭亭詩的創作源於一種新的山水審美觀念。

sentences.english: This is my aesthetic point of view.
The fourth chapter is an analysis of the influence of gender aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 《世說新語》性別審美觀的影響分析。

sentences.english: I don't need to spend the money, ' ' she says. Her aesthetic continues to resonate in the current uncertainty.
sentences.chinese: 她的審美觀在時下的不確定性中繼續獲得共鳴。

definition: hard to say/unpleasant to say/can't be sure
